name: Toro's Adventure: The Witch Cult Demo
name_original: Toro's Adventure: The Witch Cult Demo
description:
Welcome to the 1st Demo for Toro's Adventure: The Witch Cult!

Toro's Adventure: The Witch Cult is an RPG where the Toro (the Titular Character) goes and discovers a Mysterious Cult consisting only of Witches. Along the way you will meet Meloty, a Powerful Mage of whom Toro swears he met before, Celesti, a Witch who Guides you to where you need to go and Sylvia, a Pirate who leads a Ragtag bunch of Reformed Criminals.

This Game is only 16% done! What you see may or may not be part of the Final Game!
